thread.title: Who is Playing in Super Bowl 2017? Teams Revealed!
thread.title_full: Who is Playing in Super Bowl 2017? Teams Revealed!

author: Just Jared
title: Who is Playing in Super Bowl 2017? Teams Revealed!
text:
We officially know which teams are playing in the Super Bowl this year â€“ the New England Patriots and the Atlanta Falcons!
The Patriots defeated the Pittsburgh Steelers in the AFC Championship Game while the Falcons beat the Green Bay Packers during the NFC Championship Game.
WHEN IS THE SUPER BOWL? Date, time, channel, and more info revealed! 
The Patriots have been in the Super Bowl nine times and the team has won the big game four times, including in 2014.
This is the second time that the Falcons will play in the Super Bowl. The team previously appeared in the 1999 game.
